title: Whore For The Wolves
description: After being held captive for days in the Werewolf's den, an incredible secret is revealed to Sophie about her true identity. She must undertake a perilous journey even deeper into the forest, sucking and fucking whatever creature she must to stay alive.Sophie's saga comes to a dirty raunchy end in this third and final chapter of the Forced, Fucked, and Bred Trilogy.
author: Bree Bellucci
